DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether copeptin level affect food intake .
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 year Intake kind medication ( except birth control pill ) BMI > 30 kg/m2 Evidence acute illness History chronic illness Pregnancy Known galactosemia maltose malabsorption Baseline glucose level > 5.5 mmol/l Baseline sodium level < 135 mmol/l > 145 mmol/l
